mapper.insert: insert into ge_policy_raw (id, crawl_url, crawl_time, index_number, title, release_office, release_number, policy_basis, wiritten_time, release_time, effect_time, image_url, status, remark, content, html) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crawlUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crawlTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{indexNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseOffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyBasis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wirittenTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{effectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{html,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, crawl_url, crawl_time, index_number, title, release_office, release_number, policy_basis, wiritten_time, release_time, effect_time, image_url, status, remark, content, html from ge_policy_raw where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
